name: trilili game
description:
The story 

Eee,Aaa and Ooo are three cute creatures from the village of trilili who want to see their precious grandma and cheer up with their voices BUT to do so they need to mimic the hideous Kotstalefim's songs.

How to play:

                      

E,A,O keys to make each creature make it distinctive sound.

Made for Indie game course with the guidance of Danny Bacon and the assistance of Idan Rooze and Jasmine Nakash, Bezalel Academy of art and design, Jerusalem.

https://www.bezalel.ac.il/academics/bachelor_degree/viscom
